H0.text: what language do british speak. English

H1.text: what language do british speak. Welsh

H2.text: what language do british speak. Scottish Gaelic

H3.text: what language do british speak. Irish

A4.text: English is the most widely spoken and de facto official language of the United Kingdom.

A5.text: Welsh is a de jure official language under the Welsh Language (Wales) Measure 2011 in Wales.

A6.text: Welsh is spoken natively in Wales by about 18% of the population.

A7.text: In the 2021 census, 7,349 people in England recorded Welsh to be their 'main language'.
